response.overview: Andreas is an unknown actor, who has ridden the rod and believes that he was born to play only Shakespeare and culture. He has a bond with Zeta, who is a comedy star, and managed to get him a small part in a project, which she will star in. In other words, let Andreas dress up as a woman and make a college girl. But he does not agree... The couple has a close friend, Alexis, a young lawyer, who has come up with an original trick to extract money every now and then from a rich aunt who lives in Africa. Sometimes he writes to her that he just got married and he needs money to open a house, sometimes that his non-existent wife gave birth to a baby and other similar tales...
response.title: I gynaika mou, o Antreas
